website_summaries.verdict: A basic, waterproof mattress that's more comfortable for sleep than the playard pad.
pros: 3-inch playard mattress offers more support than standard playard pad
Reinforced waterproof cover and binding resist liquids and stains
Antibacterial, waterproof, lock-stitched binding helps prevent mold, mildew, and odor
cons: Mattress is a bit firm, but firm mattresses are recommended for infants

customer_reviews.title: why would you fold a mattress to mail it?
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy. Why Why Why would anyone FOLD a mattress to ship it in the mail? Including pictures, they speak for themselves. This is not a memory foam (obviously, or I wouldn't have ordered it) but that should be the only excuse to ever fold up a mattress. There's a giant crease right in the middle, like the inner cotton is broken. My daughter won't be sleeping on it. Will definitely be sending it back. If I can't send it back, maybe I'll give it to my dog. Again I ask, WHY would one fold a mattress this small to ship???
customer_reviews.author: yekkersrow

customer_reviews.title: Fits my pack n play
customer_reviews.text: I have the Graco pack n play playard with cuddle cove rocking chair- I don’t know how that compares to size / shape with other pack n plays. I’ll include a pic tho. His mattress fits just fine in our pack n play. Minimal space between the sides and even less at the top / bottom. Will serve our needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C

customer_reviews.title: Fits Graco Pack N Play Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Fits a standard Graco Pack N Play in bassinet mode. I haven't tried it at the bottom of the Pack N Play but it seems like it would also fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It’s meh.
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant with buying this mattress for my daughters pack and play graco playpen with all these bad reviews and how it does not fit. But surprisingly it fits perfectly. Fits like a glove. However, it’s not as soft as I hoped. Not enough cushion. Makes noise when she moves around. I wouldn’t recommend buying this mattress
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase for Pack and Play sleeping comfort
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to make the Graco Pack and Play more comfortable for our son while he was still sleeping in our room and before he transitioned to his crib. It fits the Graco Pack and Play perfectly. It adds comfort and padding while still meeting infant sleeping safety standards. My sister also bought one for her son to make his naps more comfortable when at his grandmother's house. Worthwhile purchase for any infant who sleeps in the Pack and Play regularly. The only downfall is that it doesn't break down to a smaller size for airline travel, though I would bring it along on a roadtrip. Purchased with the American Baby Company Jersey sheet which fits it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MK Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is easy to clean and easy for traveling but that's it. This was great for the first couple months and then it completely fell apart. I've only had this mattress for not even six months yet and it's showing wear and tear as if it's six years old. My son sleeps throughout the night and doesn't move around too much so I don't understand how it could fall apart so easily unless it's just cheap materials and poorly made. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Less then month old and torn
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our newborn to sleep on while in our bedroom from her first few months. She has been using it only for night sleeping, so maybe on it for about 8 hours. She is just a month old. The other night, 8/30, we had to change her bed sheet on this mattress at which time we discover a tear on the side stitching. Our baby is not a month old yet and only weighs 8lbs and there is already a tear..sorry but garbage. Will try to return this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged/Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a clean box, I was relieved thinking I missed out on a damaged product like other reviewers stated they had received. I open clean box to reveal a ripped plastic covered mattress with not only rust damage but some sort of a black stain. Like an oil. I tried calling the number attached to the order, it said nobody was available to talk to and to leave a message. So I’ll be calling in the morning. How do they expect people to want to use a dirty “brand new” product for their child? HOW?! I want a replacement that’s clean and undamaged or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: SAM.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have a Graco PacknPlay that was sagging on the bottom (Its lived a long life having been abused by multiple children). I didn't want to simply replace the whole thing as its still in decent shape aside from the bottom so I bought this mattress. The mattress is the perfect size. I will continue to use it long even after the playard is packed away. I intend on using it for nap times and camping trips. One of the upsides is that it doesn't have a strong chemical smell when you take it out of the packaging. I can't beat $30 either.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Makes pack n play crib more like a regular crib
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a thicker, more comfortable mattress for our pack n play for when our granddaughter sleeps at our house. She was not sleeping well on the cardboard crib floor that came with the pack n play, and I thought this would make her more comfortable. From the first time she slept on this mattress, she slept well and seemed a lot more comfortable. We have a second home and I'm going to buy this again for the pack n play there. I would not, however, recommend it for travel, as it doesn't fold and is bulky - but it's great if you want it set up somewhat permanently in a nursery or guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Labrador Bed.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased cheap floor mats to use as a Labrador Bed. My Black Lab has hip dysplasia & I had been wasting money on thin exercise type floor mats a couple of inches thick. It popped in my mind to look for a small mattress & I didn't want a used one because of bed bugs found this near same price of those cheap mats Dakota did make small puncher hole because He needs nails clipped I should have gotten the washable fitted cover with it might have protected it. But is still a wonderful purchase for My 100 + Lb baby. Very happy ty.
customer_reviews.author: Tasalagi Cwy

customer_reviews.title: SO FREAKING LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is LOUD. I'd read some other reviews about how crunchy it is before ordering but I thought maybe those folks were exaggerating a bit. NOPE. The slightest shift or movement and the whole thing is crunching and crinkling, which then wakes our daughter up. The whole point to this mattress was to help our daughter sleep better in the pack n play when we're on vacation but with this mattress she wont sleep at all. Returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: pmk

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions of your pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this mattress. It’s light weight and seems comfy- definitely more comfortable than the hard bottom of a pack n play. Our pack n play sheet fit the mattress. It was very snug!! But we got it on there. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is because there are gaps on the sides in the pack n play. My little one is old enough that this isn’t a huge problem for me. I still wish that it was a snug fit but I would highly suggest checking the inside dimensions before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: JoeCanAm

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof covering COMES OFF!
customer_reviews.text: Product was okay, until it WASN’T!!! Waterproof covering peels off! We used this mattress in our son’s pack and play for him to nap in. We always kept a sheet over it, and when I took the sheet off for regular washing today I noticed the whole outer covering was PEELING OFF and pieces were everywhere! This is NOT a quality product, and it is a CHOKING HAZARD! When I called customer service, I was told nothing could be done because I was past my return window. Absolutely DO NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindel

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: It could have killed my son, we bought this about two months ago and my infant son just handed me a piece of the plastic, it’s all blown out and ripped after a short time of use. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: A&J Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Sags badly
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly in a pack and play but that's about the only positive I can give it. Since it's all foam it sags badly in the middle. I've tried it with and with out the pnp mattress under it with the same result. If I hadn't needed to use it and don't have the box I'd have returned it after night 1. Will end up needing to spend more to get a better mattress and be out the cash on this one. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyO

customer_reviews.title: Mattress damaged
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was delivered on time, the box was undamaged, but the mattress seems to have been folded, leaving a significant crease in the center, which had not changed after several days of lying flat. I do not feel it will be safe to use with an infant.
customer_reviews.author: M Mohr

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly the Disney Baby Sweet Wonder Minnie Dot Fun Playard
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly the Disney Baby Sweet Wonder Minnie Dot Fun Playard. This is perfect. There is no space in between the playard and the mattress. Not too hard, not too soft to be a hazard. My daughter sleeps perfectly for hours. I combined this with the Pack n Play Crib Mattress Cover by Julia Grace Home.
customer_reviews.author: M &M

customer_reviews.title: WISH I would have bought this so long ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest is 1 years old. He has a bed in his room. But currently his room is partially still our office/computer room. lol. So I set up the pack n play in our bedroom for him to sleep in at night if we are on the computers. I wish I would have bought this mattress when he was 3 months. It makes a world of difference in their sleep! The so called mattress piece that comes with the pack n play's are so HARD and very uncomfortable. Needless to say. He sleeps fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a standard pack n play - and my 5 month old sons arm got stuck between the mattress and the netting. Completely unsafe. Thankfully we had a video monitor on him and saw it immediately, he was immobilized once his arm was wedged between the netting and the mattress. Sending it back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: The Curl Girl

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this mattress my baby girl would not sleep in her Minnie Mouse pack n play .. highly recommend if you are having issues with ur little one sleeping in their pack n play... the thin, hard mattress that usually comes with pack n plays are not comfortable because my older daughter got inside with the baby in an attempt to help ease the baby and she herself said it’s not comfortable and no wonder she doesn’t like sleeping in there... now it’s like night and day and now I feel so bad that I was even attempting to try to get her to sleep in it before ... a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Uneaque

customer_reviews.title: Fits pack and play perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pack and play perfectly, the floor that comes with the pack and play isn’t even a half inch thick and feels like colder plywood with 1cm of foam over it. Adding this in makes this essentially a mini crib. It is not quite 3” thick. More like 2 3/4” But it is plenty for a small child 20-40lbs. The only thing is you cannot really good this mattress up for travel so it will take up a decent amount of space. But it works very good for having a crib at a grandparents house or something.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Finney

customer_reviews.title: 16 month old fell asleep with ease
customer_reviews.text: This worked like a charm! Such a relief. Just got it in today and used it this evening for a "semi-overnight" at the sitters. Our 16 month old fell asleep perfectly right at bedtime with no issues. Fits our graco pack n play perfectly. The only downside is it's the full size of the pack n play and it doesn't fold down at all. It's a whole mattress. So you have to make sure you have the room in your car if you're going to travel with it. Ours fit very easily in the back of our Jeep Grand Cherokee.
customer_reviews.author: Amber O.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a baby trend playard for my granddaughter. We like it to keep her out of harm's way but the floor seemed awfully hard for sleeping. I read reviews and determined this was the best option. Very pleased with the fit and feel of the mattress. It has a vinyl cover so any messes should wipe up easily. One review said it shipped folded so it arrived creased. Mine was shipped flat. Took the plastic cover off and plopped it in - installed!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Monte

customer_reviews.title: Essential for travel
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Graco Pack N' Play perfectly and makes the whole thing A LOT more comfortable. Before I purchased the mattress, my baby woke up hourly. After, he slept for several hours straight. The only reasons I did not give it 5 stars is 1) the plastic cover is kind of gross...though necessary for durability 2) it is a PAIN IN THE BUTT to travel with; very bulky, doesn't fold, takes up a ton of space. However, both of these gripes can be overlooked for the sheer fact that without it, my baby could not sleep in the PNP.
customer_reviews.author: bkmlyn

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my pack n play better than the pad/mattress that came with it. It's thick enough that it raises the bed even with the mesh on the sides. There are no gaps between the mattress and walls of the pack n play. My only complaint is its not as padded as I thought it would be. I pictured crib mattress type padded/soft, but its pretty firm. Yet more padded than the one that came with the pack n play. Very satisfied and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: I replaced my son's flat, flimsy cardboard mattress that ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my son's flat, flimsy cardboard mattress that came with his Graco Pack N' Play. It was so thin that the bars supporting the bottom of the crib could be felt through the mattress. This new mattress is a much more snug fit. The original mattress left gaps at each end but this mattress does not and he can no longer feel the bars beneath him. The mattress is fairly firm and I have no worries about having my 16 month old sleep on a mattress that did not come with the Pack N' Play, although I would stick to the original mattress if he were younger and not able to roll over/sit up/support himself yet.
customer_reviews.author: ABrooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, and it’s a perfect fit for our BabyTrend pack-n-play. Love that I didn’t have to get different sheets for it either. Our Walmart brand of sheets fit perfect. I’ll have to update my review at a later date as far as sleep for my little one goes. But my guess is sleep will be even better. The standard pad that comes with pack-n-plays seems like it would be so uncomfortable. Might have to order a second one of these for our other pack-n-play
customer_reviews.author: CamoMama17

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mattresses to go into newer model Graco Pack N Plays. I read the reviews and saw some people saw that there was a small gap between the edge of the mattress and the side of their Pack N Play. I didn't have this issue, but I didn't try putting in the mattress without a mattress cover. Both of the mattresses I bought fit perfectly without any gap into my Pack N Plays. Shipping was fast and the quality is great. I am in love with the sweet print on each mattress. I have no complaints. These are high quality mattresses and I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. LeeTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped on time and fit our graco pack and play perfectly, with no gaps. I read other reviews where people had gaps but maybe of they wouldve measure correctly and ordered the right mattress, it wouldn't have been a problem. Duh. Anyway. It's firm yet soft enough for him to sleep and play on. The "mattress" that came with the pnp was a piece of crap and he refused to sleep on it. Easy to find sheets and just a quick wipe down cleans up any messes easily. I'm actually thinking about getting one for my dog to put on his crate because it looks so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Significantly Increases comfort of pack and play
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. I always felt so bad laying my baby/toddler on that lumpy hard board that comes wrapped around the pack and play. I always used to try and pad it with blankets, but nothing ever stayed, and then you worry about suffocation risk. Anyway, this mattress is supportive and comfortable, waterproof and the sheet and mattress pad fit it perfectly. I got a padded mattress pad and Mini crib sheet and it is just as good as his crib at home, just smaller. I just drop it into the pack and play and he has a comfortable place to sleep. Game changer for people that have to use travel pack and plays .
customer_reviews.author: cameronpaige

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed and concerned about the Pack n Play's original mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress works perfectly in our Pack n Play (which is our baby's primary "crib"). I was disappointed and concerned about the Pack n Play's original mattress buckling. Adding this mattress has made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Su

customer_reviews.title: The graco quilted pack n play sheets fit just fine and remain in place
customer_reviews.text: This has saved us many crying nights! Our toddler would not sleep in the pack n play (Baby Trend) Brand and now traveling with our child is no longer an issue. It fits perfectly without any gaps on either direction within the bottom of the system. The graco quilted pack n play sheets fit just fine and remain in place. We chose to keep the plastic bag the mattress came in so that the mattress stays in a bag when its loaded into the car so that it does not get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: It's snug in the Dream on Me Minicrib
customer_reviews.text: I expected this mattress to fit like a customized glove given it's made for the Dream on Me Mini crib. Finding a sjheet that fits was a challenge. I ended up using a full size crib sheet because the ones made for pack and plays weren't deep or wide enough for this mattress. This mattress does fit in the crib but you have to wrestle it down into the mini crib. Overall I liked it. My daughter in law used it in her pack and play while on vacation and it fit because the pack and play sides were flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S. Traynor

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for your baby's pack-in-play, especially if the center pokes up like ours did. We had to add a piece of plywood with lots of soft blankets on top before I knew about this mattress just so our baby would sleep well!!! My only regret is that I didn't know about this product sooner. And there is no need for a mattress protector because its waterproof plastic on both sides. I was also impressed with the quality and feel like we got our money's worth with this purchase. It arrived in 3 days with Amazon Prime too.
customer_reviews.author: Laneykit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Graco Pack ‘n Play
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize there was a mattress that can fit in the Pack ‘n Play until I came across this one online. The Pack ‘n Play itself has a hard service that I wasn’t satisfied and feel comfortable placing my baby to sleep in it. The mattress fits perfectly and is so comfortable for my 3 month old baby. Plus, having the mattress in gives it a few more inches higher in depth so it is easier for me to place him in without having to reach further that can strain my back (I’m 5’ 3”). My baby is now 5 month old and we have never encountered a problem. Wish I knew about this for my first born.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Transforms a playpen into an actual bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress!!! Should've bought it a long time ago. If you live in the city and don't have room to spare for an actual crib for your little one, like me, this transformed my playpen (Graco) into an actual crib. I originally purchased a 3 inch foam padding from a fabric store and paid about $40. It was good and did it's job but it's not waterproof so any accidents end up being absorbed into the foam (>¢<). With this new mattress, I can wipe it down plus I feel like the baby is sleeping in an actual bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have been going out a lot more now that our daughter is 4 months old but I’ve also started letting her cry it out for naps. So when we are at family functions or at friends we needed a place for her to nap, I tried just putting her in the pack n play and she hated it because the “mat” it comes with had no cushion and she refused to nap in it. I decided to get the mattress to see if it helped and of course she sleeps like a wonder in it. It’s also the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This mattress feels *so* cheap. It is not three inches. The putter material bunches some over the cheap inner filling. It was not what I was expecting for $50. At. All. I can’t imagine a mattress being cheaper so if I had it to do over again, I would definitely go with a less expensive mattress from this brand or another brand entirely. We are planning on ordering a different brand, I will update with a comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Jan R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Was a good firm mattress but didn’t fit inside my Graco pack n play perfectly. There was enough room around the mattress that my infants arms were getting stuck between the mattress and pack n play so I had to return it out of fear for safety issues. If your infant isn’t rolling around or is old enough to get their arms back out it’s probably fine. I didn’t try to travel with it but it would be inconvenient for travel.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase yet!! Must have
customer_reviews.text: The is THE mattress for a grave pack n play. Let me tell you. The pad they give you is hard and terrible on babies. Bought this and it changed everything. Very durable and worth every penny. Just like a crib! Seriously. It fits nice and snug in the corners and held up really really well. Used ours for camping trips and Disney land and even for our 3rd baby when #2 was still in the crib. Couldn’t have been happier!
customer_reviews.author: Infiniti

customer_reviews.title: Fits pack and play perfectly
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I wasn’t sure what to expect. I researched pack and play mattresses for a long time and took a chance. This fits perfectly! It’s a little more firm than I like but I know that’s what babies need. Nice and thick and well made. It wouldn’t be great for traveling unless maybe you were camping or something like that, but it sure beats the fold-up mattress that came with pack and play
customer_reviews.author: ccm

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Mattress
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good upgrade from the mat in the pack n play but it’s super noisy even with a sheet on it. Wakes my daughter up when she moves. I usually have to double sheet it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl

customer_reviews.title: 6 month old loves!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my baby trend nursery center. Bought it for my 6 month old who was having trouble sleeping all night. The first night with this mattress, he slept all night. Not all playard sheets with fit this mattress. I did have to buy bigger playard sheets. I just looked at the size the sheets fit until I found some that said they would fit this size mattress. This mattress is firm but still comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnyann

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit in Pack and Play but Baby Wasn’t a Long Term Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fit our Graco pack and play perfectly! There were not any gaps and it fit right in. My daughter outgrew the bassinet so we used this by our bed for a while. Unfortunately, I think that my baby did not find it completely comfortable and we ended up putting her in her crib. We tried it for about two weeks and after the switch, the crib seemed to give her longer stretches of sleep due to comfort I think. However, this mattress has been great for naps on the go and has been awesome for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my twin grandsons. They are still sleeping on them in their pack and plays after 2 1/2 years. Have held up well. The mattresses are still in excellent shape. The outer plastic cover is just now starting to show wear and tear. These mattresses have traveled back and forth several times for the boy's comfort no matter where they were. That being said the boys are ready for toddler beds. But Mamaw will still be using one of these mattresses at her house for a little while. Another grandson on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Barr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing portable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. Doesn't make much noise when my daughter moves, is waterproof and, makes our Graco pack n play so much more comfortable. What more could we ask for? Definitely one of the most used baby items we purchased since we take our pack n play on all our trips. Daughter sleeps through the night on this, as well as she does in her crib. It is a hassle to carry an extra mattress around but it's light, and fits perfectly in our Graco pack n play standard size. Have had it for 2 years now and still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: My kid will finally sleep in her pack and play!
customer_reviews.text: So so grateful for this purchase. Hubs and I tried everything to get our baby to sleep when we travel. Turns out the problem was her rock hard pack and play! We bought her this mattress and she hasn't had a sleep problem while traveling since. We bring this with us when we go on road trips (yes, it takes up quite a bit of space in the car but it's worth it for a good night's sleep), but obviously can't bring it when we fly. That's the biggest downside. I think I'll have to get a foldable one for such occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for pack & play
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving four stars because the mattress was slightly sliced on the side when it arrived. I’ve worked in retail so I know someone’s box cutter accidentally sliced the plastic wrap and into the mattress. It happens. It was a couple of inches long and I didn’t have time for a return so I used clear packing tape as a “bandaid”. I don’t think it will effect the quality of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: TByrd

customer_reviews.title: mom win!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Graco pack and play which had this awful board with light padding as a mattress. My baby hated it! But now with this mattress he naps and plays in the pack and play! I kept the board "matress" in the bottom and put this on top and the fit is perfect! Wish I had done this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Thickness Error-Shame on company.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for a small crib and it’s hard to find small mattress. This mattress is definitely Not a 3” thick mattress. I’m glad I didn’t buy the 2” thick mattress because the so-called 3” is just under 2.5” in thickness. Not happy about the deliberate error in the measurement that is advertised. I feel like I’ve been cheated. I combined the ultra thin mattress that came with crib and it worked out ok. Otherwise I’d be returning it!
customer_reviews.author: GiGiBlogger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for older (5yrs?) pack n play.
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about this fitting my pack n play, which we’ve had for almost 5 years, but my older child isn’t quite ready to give up the crib for the new baby yet, so I needed a solution. This mattress fits perfectly! It seems really firm to me, which is good for a baby, so I wouldn’t dock it for comfort. I got the sheet that many other reviews recommend and I’m very pleased with our new sleeping situation.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Firm but Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. We brought it for our newborn whose currently sleeping on the Bassinet feature of the playpen. Our baby sleeps well on it. The mattress is firm not super firm but comfortable . I was concerned it was going to be too hard for our baby but again its perfectly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cyp Ress4k

customer_reviews.title: Should be included with all pack and plays
customer_reviews.text: This is a great feature which one does not know about until you research it. As soon as the child is sleeping all the time in a full crib then you need this 3 inch mattress for travel or in my case as the grandmom who is also a part time babysitter. The pack and play's are nice when they are tiny, inactive and with low body mass but once they go beyond a couple of months the hard board with very little padding is not comfortable. Easy to take along for travel.
customer_reviews.author: annecarroll

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly in our pnp
customer_reviews.text: absolutely worth the minimal investment - our 8 month old will sleep in the pnp without a mattress but we were staying for an extended time at his grandparents and I wanted him to be as comfortable as possible so no one's sleep would suffer! this mattress fits perfectly in Graco playard item#1946962 and we finished it with mattress protector item#PNPMP-1 and pnp sheets item#12556A by American Baby Company. the mattress itself is lightweight but supportive and arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineOnSnowflakes

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mama!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our pack n play! A friend gave us their pack n play but it was missing the pad for the bottom of the play pen. Luckily this fit perfectly. It might be a bit big for traveling all the time, but for around the house it worked great. Very soft and had just enough padding. She plays, she sleeps, she's happy. And that makes me one happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: Raphet

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after the bottom of my daughter's pack n play started to bow in and the sides were coming up but the pack n play was practically brand new, So we ordered this mattress to replace it! It fit perfectly with no gaps (we have the Graco snuggle sleeper LX pack n play or something like that haha). The thickness of the mattress is nice and firmness is just right so baby does not sink in but still soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Would I buy this again? No.
customer_reviews.text: My poor 2 year old. When I sit on one end my son pops up off the other end. Lol. It’s actually kinda funny. But definitely not comfortable. There’s absolutely no give to the mattress. It’s like a big plastic bag with air inside. If you don’t lay exactly in the middle of the mattress you’re gonna find your self sliding or rolling to the edge of the mattress. Would I buy this again? No.
customer_reviews.author: Julie DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy for kiddo
customer_reviews.text: My kid sleeps great on this. We use it for naps at the nanny’s and use it on vacations for overnight sleep. Been using this product since my kid was 1yr old and it’s been great. More comfortable than the hard cardboard in a packnplay but not so soft to make it feel unsafe. Just right amount of give. Fits perfect in my Baby Trend Go-Lite ELX Nursery Center pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accidentally got this one....
customer_reviews.text: We order the innerspring mattress from this same company and loved it. We thought we ordered a second one but instead got this one. It's definitely not quite as "nice" but it works well in a playard for occasional use. It's basically just foam so time will tell how well it holds up. The innerspring version is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Web Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for pack and play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress to go inside a pack and play for a week long vacation. I think it really increased my little one’s sleep quality. It was a little large to transport, but we have a three row SUV and sacrificed the space to bring it with us. I also brought this to my daycare providers house so she could use it in her pack and play. I think it’s a good value and worked well for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress fits Pac n Play perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress fits in my Graco Pack n Play perfectly with no gaps or anything. It is thick and offers much better support than the thin pad the pack n play came with. This will work out perfectly as a temporary bed while my sister is in town with her little one. The mattress itself feels as if it is made of a thick waterproof material, I would recommend purchasing a fitted sheet that fits this mattress for extra comfort. I will update this review once the mattress has been used. Hopefully my 1 yr old niece sleeps comfortably on it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a cozy bed for baby
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know they had playard mattresses until I went to my in laws and they had one. My little boy slept so much better on the mattress than just on the little liner that comes in the pack n play. He would move around so much with just the liner, I don’t blame him it’s not comfortable. This is more like the mattress in the crib. Also, don’t forget to purchase a sheet designed for a pack n play mattress! I will buy anything to have more z’s for my baby ...and me 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: Not portable but is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Since this is for a portable crib it would be helpful if this mattress was all one piece on one side , but split on the other side so when in the portable it would feel like one but out of it would fold in half for travel. The little one will not sleep on the mat that comes with the portable so packing this mattress is a must and is difficult, certainly not for air travel. He seems to sleep well on it once asleep, but I have seen him fall asleep faster on other mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: reviewguru

customer_reviews.title: This mattress and the pack n play can be combined to form a nice and comfy crib!
customer_reviews.text: We use this mattress in my younger sons pack and play. It’s a lot more comfortable than the thin one that comes with it. It’s exaclty the same size so there is no gap on the side and is really convenient. The only downfall is that you cannot take this mattress to travel as it doesn’t fold up but for the purpose we need it for, it works wonders! My grandmother even makes sheets for it
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good with a terrible flaw
customer_reviews.text: It fits and is really stiff but good for babies. My problem with this is the plastic on outside or whatever material it is sheds when you touch it and is choking hazard. I have never seen a mattress with such a cheap material on the outside for babies.
customer_reviews.author: crystal warren

customer_reviews.title: Good pack and play mattress
customer_reviews.text: It is a slick plastic which is great if you are worried about diapers leaking. That may make it a little less soft and comfortable but for how little it is used it’s just fine. Side note, my big boy just discovered it slides down the stairs really well and has been having the BEST TIME using it to slide down. I can’t even tell him not to because it really does look like fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: and when it arrived our loves literally changed for the better. Sleep deprived parents- I hear you
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more than 5 stars I would. Our baby did not sleep through the night until we bought this mattress, and when it arrived our loves literally changed for the better. Sleep deprived parents- I hear you. BUY THIS MATTRESS. You'll thank me later! ;) (we put it inside a Graco pack 'n play and it fit perfectly!)
customer_reviews.author: Mygoldenandme

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fix to lumpy pack n play mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal especially if you get an open box (I spent about $15)! It fits a Chicco play yard perfectly with no gaps. It is a little firm and noisy from the waterproof lining but a quilted pack n play cover does the trick. It's not the best for traveling since it can't be folded and is quite cumbersome, but is skinny enough to slip between the backseat legroom.
customer_reviews.author: miasampietro

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: The mattress did fit into my son's pack and play- although there was a gap if I push against the mesh side. I don't think I'd be 100% comfortable of that with my 2 month old son. The deal breaker, though, was the mattress was dirty. I wiped it off and it turned a wipe gray. I returned it and plan to use a soft mattress cover and sheet over the thin mattress pad that came with the pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: southern mama

customer_reviews.title: Fits baby trend play pen
customer_reviews.text: purchase this for a baby trend play pen and it fits almost perfectly! I'm really happy with the purchase. Almost no gaps at all. You can barely put your fingers in between it. I'm super happy with it. Especially after having to return one of another brand because it had huge gaps. The baby definitely likes it a lot more than she liked the hard pad it came with
customer_reviews.author: Holli Ann

customer_reviews.title: My lab loves it
customer_reviews.text: Well I will say it is a mattress although the description that I read said it was a crib mattress which turned out to be a pack and play mattress which is not the same it shorter and thinner but that’s what I get for buying an open box Special with that so great information/descriptions but it works great for a dog bed my dog is extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Carnley

customer_reviews.title: Great! But not for newborn permanent sleep place
customer_reviews.text: The mattress fits great in pack a play. The top portion has about one finger gap on each side. Bottom about an inch. Great for lounging and supervised day naps but I would not make it a permanent sleep place for newborn. Bottom portion will work great for play time later on. Do not replace Graco original mattress if you planning to use it as permanent sleep place for newborn. Instruction say its not safe.
customer_reviews.author: iskate

customer_reviews.title: Makes it a more comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me on so many trips. My son hates his pack and play (4moms breeze) but as soon and I put this in it he will use it for naps and bed time. It does have a small gap around the edges but he's 18 months old and doesn't pay much attention to it. It is kind of big but thin. But I think it makes it more comfortable so I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Lots more comfort for the baby
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress for the Pack n Play I have for my granddaughter when she visits. The mattress that comes with the PNP is very thin and I wanted something with a bit more cushion for her. She slept very well on this mattress. This mattress isn't very portable as it isn't meant to fold up. I have no complaints and it arrived sooner than expected. I would recommend this to anyone needing more comfort in the PNP.
customer_reviews.author: Kammy17

customer_reviews.title: Finally the one that fits
customer_reviews.text: This is my third mattress... I finally found the one that fit the Graco Pasadena pack and play.... it’s one of the largest versions they have. It was very hard to find the mattress that was just right. I was a little scared cuz the measurements are a little smaller than the actual pack and play but it works great! It only has a gap if you force the mesh.. which their is no reason to do so. If you have the Pasadena Collection... this is the mattress for you.
customer_reviews.author: carolina

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fits perfectly in the pack n play, and baby sleeps well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress to use for bed time sleep in our room. We are not ready to transition our baby into her room just yet. It’s a soft cushion and fits perfectly in the pack n play. It’s a bit annoying when you have to lug it around for travel but so worth it. I don’t worry that my baby is sleeping on a hard flat piece anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly V

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: We opted to get a mattress for my son's playard to use it as his bassinet instead of buying an actual bassinet that he would grow out of. Saved us some money for sure and my son seems very comfortable on it too! Just wish it was a little thicker to raise him up more which would make it easier on my back when picking him up out of the playard.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Perea

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever! Making it so much more comfortable for your baby!
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to have your baby sleep in the pack n play more then ONCE A WEEK or if you go on a long trip this mattress should be purchased. Without this mattress pad the pack n play is extremely hard for a baby’s to sleep on. We keep a pack n play in our bedroom for naps or if we are laying down our toddler and this makes it so much more comfortable for our newborn.
customer_reviews.author: JCOlivas#2

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I feel so bad for making my kids sleep in their pack and play without these mattresses! I think they've made a huge difference in sleep quality when they're away from home. They're soft but not too soft so you won't have to worry if baby rolls over. They can't be folded but they're small enough to fit in the trunk of a sedan (Civic).
customer_reviews.author: Brittany W.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and they fit perfect in our Graco pack and plays. We have it on bassinets in the pack and play but since they (twins) aren’t rolling or pulling up yet they work just fine. They sleep so much better with these mattresses than with the cardboard ones the pack and plays came with. I guess there is a concern about how long they will last but time will tell. But I’m very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: may77

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: When my son grew out of his bassinet, I wasn’t ready to put him in his crib. The “mattress” that comes with the pack n play is too thin for him to sleep on all night. But he sleeps fine with this mattress! He’s been using it for a while now. (He’s 22lbs and 14 months.) The mattress fits tightly on a Graco pack n play. I bought different sheets to fit the mattress and it’s perfect. I highly recommend this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AlissaHenryTV

customer_reviews.title: My 12 month old is sleeping like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old was waking up every hour using the standard pack n play mattress. As soon as we had her use this mattress with a mattress pad, it was so soft and comfortable - like her crib at home - she slept like a dream two nights in a row. We don't use the pack n play often, just a few weekends here and there in the spring and fall at our beach house or occasional hotel. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: TickleMeElmo

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Very firm, but better then the provided sleeping pad for pack n plays. Came in on big box, flat. Takes up a lot of room to pack, but worth it if you're child is used to a crib. I will add that it adds height to the pack n play, kiddo might be able break free a little more easily! We've only used it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt first like it says
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT FIT GRAYCO PACK N PLAYS. I have one due to my house being to small for a crib so my daughters sleeps in it. I researched this and read reviews before I purchased it, looked at the dimensions of both pack n play and mattress. I thought finally I really think I found one, nope. It doesnt fit so it sticks up higher on the sides and the middle is flush with the bottom of the pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Mckayle Puls

customer_reviews.title: Life saver !
customer_reviews.text: Life saver . My one month old has been sleeping in my bed for three weeks straight. Every time I put her in the play yard, she would cry and stay awake . I didn’t know the play yard was suppose to have a mattress in the top part . I purchase this as a test, to see if she will actually sleep on it . And it was a miracle! She falls asleep like nothing before . And she sleeps for a good amount a time so I can catch some shut eye too.
customer_reviews.author: breeofplague

customer_reviews.title: So. Freaking. Noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why this mattress gets good reviews. It could be comfortable, but the plastic that lines it is so loud, it crinkles with any little movement. I didn’t travel with our mattress pad, but even those are thin (because babies can’t sleep on plush), I don’t think that would have muffled the noise. I doubled sheets and that made no difference. I also didn’t think it felt much softer than the pack n’ play’s original pad- yes, it’s thicker but still quite hard. The only thing they did right was the size, as it did fit well in the pack n’ play.
customer_reviews.author: Clint W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to replicate your babies bed at home when you travel
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for us and our little one when we travel. The pak n okay cribs are great but they are SO uncomfortable compared to your babies bed at home. This mattress feels just like our sons crib mattress so it was really great to take with us. I was actually able to fold this in half and put it in one side of our suite case that we check in at the airport for a flight. It is really easy to travel with somif your concerned about how to do that, let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Dingman

customer_reviews.title: Crinkly and loud
customer_reviews.text: The protective layer on the mattress crinkles loudly whenever my son moves. I end up putting two sheets over the top to try to muffle it, but seems uncomfortable and he doesn’t sleep well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Fits pack and play play yard and nearby napper.... info following
customer_reviews.text: Fit pack and play perfectly. Nice tight fit and very soft. Grandma is ready for a visit now !! WORKS GREAT WITH ------. Waterproof Pack N Play Mattress Pad - Fitted.( don't have to have but give a nicer feel to mattress) American Baby Company 2 Piece 100% Cotton Value Jersey Knit Fitted Portable/Mini-Crib Sheet,..
customer_reviews.author: Vkesu

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchases
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with the mattress mat that comes with my Graco Pack 'n Play which is used occasionally by my granddaughter at my house. So I researched and purchased this mattress, which fits perfectly, no gaps. I purchased sheets from stores nearby (including the Graco brand) and returned because they did not fit. So based on the Amazon reviews, I ordered American Baby Company100% Organic Cotton Interlock Fitted Pack N Play Sheet, Natural and American Baby Company Organic Cotton Quilted Pack n Play Size Fitted Mattress Pad Cover, Natural. The mattress pad and the sheet are very soft and fit perfectly. They also wash very well. I am very happy with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sueg

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect with Graco pack n play
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress when I was taking my infant son on a trip to Colorado. It was a last minute purchase so I had to deal with it but it came with a big gash on one corner of the mattress. I just put some clear tape over top and moved on. It worked perfectly though and fits my Graco pack n play like a glove!! I did use multiple sheets on it so it made it softer but it worked just as I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Dilanne

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight/ waterproof/ enough thickness
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect perfect perfect addition to pack and play!!! It’s perfect thickness. I like that the mattress is waterproof and lightweight. I am not planning to use it for sleeping or traveling at all because I don’t think it’s firm enough for sleeping only playing during the day! Very happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a Pack and Play
customer_reviews.text: We babysit our, now, 8 mo old great grandson 1 day a week. We have a Pack and Play that he sleeps in. The bottom has a cushion but we wanted something more comfortable. This mattress fits snugly with NO space for a baby to accidentally get stuck between the mattress and sides. Our great grandson seems much more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old son never could sleep in his play yard because it just came with a really uncomfortable thin bottom. I ordered this for our summer travels and it's been great. The first night he slept just like he does at home. I bought a fitted sheet for it (what amazon recommended) and it has made his sleep away from home great. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Zaborowski

customer_reviews.title: What a great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a pack and play for my grandchildren for more than 12 years. The pad that comes with the pack and play is thin and underpadded. I have searched for a better mattress for years and the Dream On Me is perfect! It fits my unit completely. It is easy to wipe down, and does not have any plastic/vinyl odor. And, the mattress is certainly comfy if my little one can fall asleep on it! I highly recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Miccio

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pac n Play, Quality is Okay
customer_reviews.text: The standard mattress that comes with the pack and play is so thin and hard my infant couldn’t sleep on it even with a padded cover. So I bought this 3 inch mattress and it did the trick. We had it for 2 months and already the middle is caving in. My baby is 15 pounds, now 16 and maybe too heavy for the mattress as it’s denting now.
customer_reviews.author: YELP Critic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the Graco pack and play. Plastic like surface makes it easy to clean. Recommend getting the fitted sheet that goes with this, makes the surface more comfortable and obviously fits this mattress perfectly and tight, so baby can't pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: Edrock200

customer_reviews.title: Fits in Graco Play Pen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using her Graco Pack and Play Play Pen for sleeping in our room ever since she outgrew her auto rocker. This mattress fit perfectly in the bottom. This one is a bit loud though every time she moves because of the plastic vinyl. It's not that soft but she sleeps on it so I guess it's "comfy" enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Life in PNW

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for pack 'n play!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be comfortable enough. Not something that is convenient if your using it as an everyday pack and play thats portable. Don't think it would fold well or fit in bag. Therefore bulky for that. I use it as a permanent sleeping area for my grandson. Definitely pleased with it. I use it in the Graco Pack 'n Play On the Go Playard/Twister. It fits perfectly!!! Happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: KimF

product_meta.title: Dream On Me 3" Playard Mattress, White
product_meta.description:
Dream On Me 3 " Play Yard Mattress provides an inviting, comfy environment for playtime. Measuring 37.5 inches long by 25.5 inches wide and 3 inches high, this mattress has four, 90 degree corners fitting Graco Playards with similar 90 degree corners inside the play yard area where the mattress sits. This exceptional mattress is constructed with quality materials and workmanship in the USA. Features include a non-allergenic, anti-bacterial waterproof cover that wipes clean with mild soap and water and aids in the prevention of mold, mildew and odor. Meets Federal Standard Flammability Standard 16-CFR 1632. All Dream on Me mattresses are GREENGUARD Gold Certified for a healthy indoor environment for your baby. Dimensions:Length 37.5 inches X Width 25.5 inches X Height 3 inches

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Dream On Me recommends this mattress to be used with the below listed “Play Yards” 



Fisher Price Ultra-Lite Day & Night Play Yard #CBV60 

Chicco Lullaby LX Playard #06079059500070 

Baby Trend Nursery Center Playard #PY81400 

Graco Pack ‘n Play Playard with Automatic Folding Feet #1801373 

Chicco Lullaby LX Playard #06079059500070 

Graco Day2Night Sleep System #1907179 

FUNSPORT DELUXE PLAY YARD PY384 

Graco Day2Night Sleep System #1852644 

Baby Trend Nursery Center (Tanzania Collection) #PY81979 

Safety 1st Disney Baby Sweet Wonder Playard #PY379EKY 

Cosco Funsport Playard#PY384DHC 

Graco Pack ‘N Play Snuggle Suite LX Playard #1927563 

Graco Pack ‘n Play (Pasadena Collection) #1801373 

Fisher Price Ultra Lite Day & Night Play yard #CJK24-998  * When using this mattress, please make sure it fits tightly in play yard without any gaps between mattress and side walls of the play yard.
 * NEVER use this mattress on the top level of Play yard in its bassinet position.
 * KEEP ALL FOREIGN OBJECTS OUT OF THE PLAY YARD Including
 * Pillows
 * Quilts
 * Comforters
 * Cushions

**Or any other object that is not intended to be used inside a play yard**
feature_bullets: This product is intended to be use from 6 months and up. Dimensions: 37.5" L x 25.5" W x 3" H
Antibacterial, waterproof lock stitched binding helps prevent mold, mildew and odor from seeping inside like cotton binding allows.
NEVER use this mattress on the top level of Play yard in its bassinet position
Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging
Passes all Flammability tests (16 CFR 1632 /1633) without the use of flame retardants and also pass phthalate, lead and toxicity tests, also pass phthalate, lead and toxicity tests
Fisher Price Ultra Lite Day & Night Play yard #CJK24-998 When using this mattress, please make sure it fits tightly in play yard without any gaps between mattress and side walls of the play yard
Accommodates babies 3 45 pounds. Fits the Graco square pack n' play
